content.name: earphone
content.label: Earphone
content.gloss: earphone with two sub-types (headphone and earbud)

content.name: headphone
content.label: Headphone
content.gloss: a kind of earphone that covers the ears

content.name: earbud
content.label: Earbud
content.gloss: a kind of earphone without the supporting top band

content.name: connector_wire
content.label: Connector Wire
content.gloss: connecting wire that connects the headphone with a device

content.name: head_band
content.label: Head Band
content.gloss: the headband of the headphone

content.name: earcup_unit
content.label: Earcup Unit
content.gloss: whole earcup of the headphone

content.name: earbud_connector_wire
content.label: Earbud Connector Wire
content.gloss: connector wire of earbud (with Y-splitter)

content.name: earbud_unit
content.label: Earbud Unit
content.gloss: a earbud unit

content.name: in_line_control
content.label: In-Line Control
content.gloss: a In-line Control unit

content.name: cable
content.label: Cable
content.gloss: cable part of the wire

content.name: connector_plug
content.label: Connector Plug
content.gloss: a connector plug (usually 3.5mm)

content.name: top_band
content.label: Top Band
content.gloss: top band or headband of the headphone

content.name: slider
content.label: Slider
content.gloss: connects a earcup with the top band

content.name: y_splitter
content.label: Y-Splitter
content.gloss: Y-Splitter that splits the cable

content.name: earcup_frame
content.label: Earcup Frame
content.gloss: main headphone earcup frame

content.name: earcup_pad
content.label: Earcup Pad
content.gloss: the padding part contacts an ear

content.name: earcup_connector
content.label: Earcup Connector
content.gloss: connector between a earpad and a slider

content.name: earbud_frame
content.label: Earbud Frame
content.gloss: main headphone earbud frame

content.name: earbud_pad
content.label: Earbud Pad
content.gloss: the soft bud pad contacts an ear

content.name: earbud_connector
content.label: Earbud Connector
content.gloss: connector between a earpad and a cord/line
